name: Chezzz - The Floating Spider
description:
This is my contribution to the MiniJam 2023 "Web" by itch.io i.e. https://minijamofficial.com/

You play a spider which is hungry. Swing from one end to the other and satisfy your inner growl.

Maybe some day you'll be able to move on and find a better habitat..

Payments are not necessary but appreciated.
It's totally free. So go ahead and play it!

If you like what I do, please leave a comment and rate.
Thank you very much for visiting and playing my game.
